mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO , EMP_NAME , EMP_PWD , DEPT_CODE , DEPT_NAME , EMP_RANK , RANK_NAME , AGE , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , BIRTHDAY , VACATION , JOIN_DATE FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN DEPARTMENT USING (DEPT_CODE) JOIN EMPLOYEE_RANK USING(EMP_RANK) WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT EMP_NO , EMP_NAME , DEPT_NAME , RANK_NAME , AGE , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , BIRTHDAY , JOIN_DATE FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN DEPARTMENT USING(DEPT_CODE) JOIN EMPLOYEE_RANK USING(EMP_RANK) WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, DEPT_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN DEPARTMENT USING(DEPT_CODE) WHERE EMP_RANK IN('R2','R3') AND DEPT_CODE IN ( SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} UNION ALL SELECT PARENT_DEPT FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN DEPARTMENT USING(DEPT_CODE) WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo})

SELECT EMP_NO , EMP_NAME , DEPT_CODE , DEPT_NAME , EMP_RANK , RANK_NAME , UNREAD_COUNT FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN DEPARTMENT USING(DEPT_CODE) JOIN EMPLOYEE_RANK USING(EMP_RANK) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SEND, RECEIVE, COUNT(*) AS "UNREAD_COUNT" FROM MESSAGE_DATA WHERE RECEIVE = #{empNo} AND READ_MSG = 'N' GROUP BY SEND, RECEIVE ) ON(EMP_NO = SEND) WHERE EMP_NO != #{empNo} AND EMP_NO != 99 ORDER BY DEPT_CODE, EMP_RANK, EMP_NAME

SELECT EMP_NO , EMP_NAME , DEPT_CODE , DEPT_NAME , EMP_RANK , RANK_NAME , UNREAD_COUNT FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN DEPARTMENT USING(DEPT_CODE) JOIN EMPLOYEE_RANK USING(EMP_RANK) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SEND, RECEIVE, COUNT(*) AS "UNREAD_COUNT" FROM MESSAGE_DATA WHERE RECEIVE = #{empNo} AND READ_MSG = 'N' GROUP BY SEND, RECEIVE ) ON(EMP_NO = SEND) WHERE EMP_NO != #{empNo} AND EMP_NO != 99 AND EMP_NAME LIKE '%'||#{empName}||'%' ORDER BY DEPT_CODE, EMP_RANK, EMP_NAME
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO != 99
SELECT EMP_NO , DEPT_NAME , RANK_NAME , EMP_NAME , JOIN_DATE FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN DEPARTMENT USING(DEPT_CODE) JOIN EMPLOYEE_RANK USING(EMP_RANK) WHERE EMP_NO != 99 ORDER BY DEPT_CODE, EMP_RANK, EMP_NO
